const response = await client.security.putRoleMapping({
  name: "jwt_user1",
  refresh: "true",
  roles: ["jwt_role1"],
  rules: {
    all: [
      {
        field: {
          "realm.name": "jwt2",
        },
      },
      {
        field: {
          username: "user2",
        },
      },
    ],
  },
  enabled: true,
  metadata: {
    version: 1,
  },
});
console.log(response);
